translation: The action {{.action_title}}, regarding incident {{.incident_name}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}.
The following action was assigned to you: {{.action_title}}.
An action has been assigned to you
The following action was just marked as complete: {{.action_title}}, assigned to {{.assignee}}.
The following action is almost overdue: {{.action_title}}
The following action is almost overdue: {{.action_title}}, assigned to {{.assignee}}.
Warning! The following action is overdue: {{.action_title}}.
Warning! The following action is overdue: {{.action_title}}, assigned to {{.assignee}}.
{{.owner}} has reassigned the action {{.action_title}} to someone else. You are no longer responsible.
A new permission was given to you. You can now use {{.app_name}} as a/an {{.role}}. Click here to go to {{.app_name}}.
Your administrator has reset your password. Click here to create a new password.

translation.one: Successfully imported {{.number}} user. Click here to open AdminChanger and manage users.
translation.other: Successfully imported {{.number}} users. Click here to open AdminChanger and manage users.

translation: The action {{.action_title}}, regarding incident {{.incident_name}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}.
A new log with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.logger}}.
Warning! A new log with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.logger}}. This might require your immediate attention.
The action {{.action_title}}, regarding incident {{.incident_name}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}.
The following incident was assigned to you by {{.assigner}}: {{.incident_name}}.
The following incident has not been updated for two weeks and is still open: {{.incident_name}}.
Your log {{.refnumber}} has been archived by {{.manager}}.
Your log {{.refnumber}} was used by {{.manager}} to create an incident.

translation.one: A report was shared with you by {{.sender}} showing {{.X}} over {{.Y}} for {{.number}} Location. Click here to view it in ReportChanger.
translation.other: A report was shared with you by {{.sender}} showing {{.X}} over {{.Y}} for {{.number}} Locations. Click here to view it in ReportChanger.
